trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Mansfield
There were no other sightings in Mansfield on or around September 21st 2013
divs: Sighting Details1. I was on patio in backyard. 2. I was looking for the bright light my wife and I observed a few minutes earlier. 3. UFO 4. Object was heading southwest in direction of where the bright light was. 5. I felt as if I had just seen a UFO, did not even tell my wife until Mon. after reading newspaper. 6. Object just went out of site. As reported Monday 23 September in the DALLAS MORNIN NEWS on page 3. TEXANS SAW FIREBALL, SCIENTFIC SOCIETY SAYS. The American Meteor Society says a bright light in the sky reported Sat. night by hundreds of Texans probably was a fireball , a term for a very bright meteor. I saw the bright light and it was not a meteor, it did not move. It was after the bright light that I saw the UFO.
Summary: I saw UFO after seeing bright light in sky.
